subject: Restaurants
New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: Joe Bastianich, a star restaurateur and winemaker, has been training for the New York City Marathon on a diet of rib-eyes, cured pig jowl and even Dom Pérignon.
snippet: Joe Bastianich, a star restaurateur and winemaker, has been training for the New York City Marathon on a diet of rib-eyes, cured pig jowl and even Dom Pérignon.
